what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: KpCoeff R package prediction tissue-plasma partition coefficients (Kp) using published method published/unified dataset. KpCoeff free open-source software.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Unified dataset reference Reference

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Install current development version

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: welcome questions anything KpCoeff: installation, dataset, works, reference, understanding better KpCoeff works. also welcome suggestions make KpCoeff useful PBPK community.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Predict tissue-plasma partition coefficient using P&T method reference dataset Predict tissue-plasma partition coefficient using R&R method unified dataset result can direcly incorporated simulation model mrgsolve package Example using KpCoeff result mrgsolve package soon updated

what: Calculation of tissue-plasma partition coefficient — Kpcoeff
title: Calculation of tissue-plasma partition coefficient — Kpcoeff
text: calculates tissue-plasma partition coefficient using specified prediction method human physiology dataset

title: Calculation of tissue-plasma partition coefficient — Kpcoeff
code: Kpcoeff(logP, pKa, fup, BP, type = 3, pred = "P&T", dattype = 0)

title: Calculation of tissue-plasma partition coefficient — Kpcoeff
text: logP partition coefficient (octanol--water) pKa Acid dissociation constant (ampholyte zwitterion, enter Acid pKa first) fup Plasma unbound fraction BP Blood--plasma ratio type Neutral(1)/acid(2)/base(3)/diprotic acid(4)/diprotic base(5)/zwitterion(ampholyte)(6) pred Prediction method (Poulin&Theil - "P&T", Rowland&Rowdgers - "R&R", Berezhesky - "Berez", PKsim - "pksim", Schmitt - "Schmitt") dattype Human physiology dataset(0 - original dataset, 1 - unified dataset)

title: Calculation of tissue-plasma partition coefficient — Kpcoeff
text: list partition coefficient organ

title: Calculation of tissue-plasma partition coefficient — Kpcoeff
